title: Sans Serif bold font - logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417043942im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Boss%20font_6060.jpg)

The client provided me with the logo in curves, but want additional information on sign in same font.  
Please help.  
Regards  
Mignon

Font: 

 Sansation (Bold) 

Solved By: 

 [bojev](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417043942/http:/typophile.com/user/7409 "View user profile.")
